name: Fruity space
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.

Modifications:

  1. I replace all the game contents with  original 2d arts
  2. There're three distinct levels in the game 
  3. There's two big bosses in level 3
  4. Minimap has been added to give the player a better view for all the scene contents.  

Credits: 

Created by Omar Alkaley

Music & Sounds from Zapsplat.com.
